trans-unit.source: A binding parameter that can be used with the HTTP Transport to specify the setting for HttpMessage support.
trans-unit.target: 支持可以与 HTTP 传输一起使用来指定 HttpMessage 的设置的绑定参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpMessageSettings"></xref> class.
Determines whether the specified Object is equal to the current Object.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否等于当前对象。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前对象进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified Object is equal to the current Object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的对象是否等于当前对象;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the HTTP transport should support <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage"></xref> and <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应支持 HTTP 传输<xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage"></xref>和<xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the HTTP transport supports <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage"></xref> and <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"></xref> instances; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 HTTP 传输支持<xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage"></xref>和<xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"></xref>实例; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
